title: MOOC Quality Assessment and Online Mathematics Course Design Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Online Learning Experience and Basic Mathematical Knowledge
context.additional_context: Requires adaptive content design for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: One can explain and apply the five core criteria of a MOOC quality evaluation framework in practical settings.
One can present three interaction elements to consider when designing smartphone-optimized mathematics educational content.
One can develop an assessment tool that enhances learner engagement by over 20% through project-based evaluation.

resources: Open-Source Tools for Mathematics Education (GeoGebra, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
